reference.title: Setting incremental restore (CLI)
reference.shortdesc: Restore operations are performed by the cbbackup tool. Incremental restore provides partial restore functionality.

section.title: cbrestore
section.p: Data from a specific period of time is restored. The cbrestore tool browses through the subdirectories and files in the backup directory and finds all related Couchbase backup files to restore.

row.entry: Restores the data from this date. The date is specified as yyyy-mm-dd. Data collected before this date is not restored.
Restores data until this date. The date is specified as yyyy-mm-dd. Data collected after this date is not restored.
